sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PFGDevOpsAPI</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PFGDevOpsAPI</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PFGDevOpsAPI = Class.create();
PFGevOpsAPI.prototype = {
	ORCHESTRATION_MAPPING: { // pipeline
		'payload_field' : 'table_field'
	},
	CODE_MAPPING: {}, // repository
    initialize: function() {
    },
	/*
	 payload :  pipeline data or repository data
	 params : additional parameters like tool id, etc.
	*/
	checkAndInsert: function (TABLE_NAME, MAPPING, payload, params) {
		// polymorphism example
		// check if exists
		var ga = new GlideAggregate(TABLE_NAME);
		ga.addAggregate("COUNT");
		for (var i in MAPPING){
			ga.addQuery(MAPPING[i], payload[i]);
		}
		ga.query();
		
		if (ga.getAggregate("COUNT") == 0) {
			// insert record
			var gr = new GlideRecord(TABLE_NAME);
			gr.initialize();
			for (i in MAPPING) {
				if (gr.isValidField(MAPPING[i])){
					gr[MAPPING[i]] = payload[i];
				}
			}
			gr.insert();
			return true;
		}
		return false;
			
	},
	
    type: 'PFGDevOpsAPI'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-27 14:21:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>53318bd82f730510d8a4d5f62799b6fd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PFGDevOpsAPI</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_53318bd82f730510d8a4d5f62799b6fd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-27 16:12:53</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>939</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
